In the table shown, the formula relating $ x$ and $ y$ is:\\
\[ \begin{tabular}{|c|c|c|c|c|c|} \hline x & 1 & 2 & 3 & 4 & 5 \\
\hline y & 3 & 7 & 13 & 21 & 31 \\
\hline \end{tabular}
\]$ \textbf{(A)}\ y = 4x - 1 \qquad\textbf{(B)}\ y = x^3 - x^2 + x + 2 \qquad\textbf{(C)}\ y = x^2 + x + 1$\\
$ \textbf{(D)}\ y = (x^2 + x + 1)(x - 1) \qquad\textbf{(E)}\ \text{none of these}$
